et: Latin {it}emetica{/it}, from Greek {it}emetikē{/it}, from feminine of {it}emetikos{/it} causing vomiting, from {it}emein{/it} to vomit {ma}{mat|vomit|}{/ma}

dt: {bc}a poisonous efflorescent crystalline salt C{inf}8{/inf}H{inf}4{/inf}K{inf}2{/inf}O{inf}12{/inf}Sb{inf}2{/inf}·3H{inf}2{/inf}O of sweetish metallic taste that is used in dyeing as a mordant and especially formerly in medicine as an emetic and expectorant

shortdef: a poisonous efflorescent crystalline salt C8H4K2O12Sb2·3H2O of sweetish metallic taste that is used in dyeing as a mordant and especially formerly in medicine as an emetic and expectorant
